name: PAT_ENC_DELIVRY_HX
description: The PAT_ENC_DELIVRY_HX table contains information on inpatient ADT-related labor & delivery status history.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient whose labor & delivery history this is.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The patient encounter contact date in internal format.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count field for the maternal delivery history related group.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number for the patient encounter.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The patient encounter contact date in external format.

columns.name: DLVR_HX_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The labor & delivery history status (no released values).

columns.name: DLVR_HX_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time a patient's labor and delivery status changed.
